attributes.action: Bring in the use of ALL possible measures to control the London Riots
attributes.additional_details: In the past few days we have seen areas on London descend into chaos due to the limited resources on the police. We need to allow the use of water cannons, the TA and other measures. If this is not acted on immediately and those involved are not dealt with in the most harsh of manners then we will be heading for ruin.
